long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Water Kitty: Stay Hydrated with the Purrfect Water Reminder

Stay on top of your hydration goals with Water Kitty, the cutest and most reliable water reminder extension you'll ever need! Designed to seamlessly integrate into your daily routine, Water Kitty ensures that you never forget to drink water, keeping you refreshed and healthy throughout the day.

Every hour, your friendly Water Kitty sends you a gentle reminder to sip some water, accompanied by an adorable meow and a charming notification. Whether you're deep in work, browsing the web, or watching videos, Water Kitty's subtle nudges help you stay hydrated without interrupting your flow.

With customizable intervals and sound settings, Water Kitty adapts to your needs, making hydration a delightful part of your day. Say goodbye to dehydration and hello to a healthier, more energized you with Water Kitty â€“ your personal hydration assistant, always ready to remind you with a purr!

Key Features:

    Hourly Reminders: Get regular prompts to drink water, with customizable intervals.
    Adorable Alerts: Receive reminders with a cute kitty notification and sound.
    Easy to Use: Simple setup and user-friendly interface.
    Customizable Sound: Choose your preferred alert sound or mute it if needed.

Stay hydrated, stay healthy, and let Water Kitty be your hydration companion. Download now and start your journey to better hydration with a little help from your furry friend!
